messages.title: Working Nationally
messages.content: With a strong negotiating hand and clear plan for Britain, Theresa May will fight for the best deal with Europe. A strong economy needs a strong negotiating team.

messages.title: Working Locally
messages.content: Alistair Burt working with Theresa May for North East Bedfordshire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build a deep and special partnership with our friends across Europe, but ensure that the decision to leave the EU is respected, and make sure Brexit works for the whole country.
Strengthen the UK's negotiating hand and secure our economy for the future.

issues.brexitEurope: Build a deep and special partnership with our friends across Europe.
issues.economy: A strong economy needs a strong negotiating team. Strengthen UK's negotiating hand and secure our economy for the future.
issues.governance: Theresa May's strong leadership in the national interest.

endorsements.endorsement: Endorsement from the party leader shown on the leaflet.

quotes.text: Alistair has been an outstanding MP for NE Bedfordshire
quotes.source: Endorsement from Theresa May on the leaflet.

images.caption: Alistair Burt pictured with Theresa May
Graphic showing Theresa May as the strong leader in contrast to other leaders

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is primarily focused on Brexit and the economy with emphasis on Theresa May's leadership and Alistair Burt's work with her.
